tool_description: Fast and Reliable Search for EV Charging Stations Anywhere in the World, Including Connector Availability, Types and Power information / Options.
name: EV Charge Finder
title: EV Charge Finder

api_list.name: Search by Location
api_list.description: Search for EV charging stations near a specific location specified as a free-form location query (e.g. *San Francisco, CA, USA*).

required_parameters.name: near
required_parameters.description: Free-form location query to search near by (e.g. *San Francisco, CA, USA*).

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Return EV charging stations with connectors of one or more types, specified as a comma (,) delimited list of connector types to match.

**e.g.** *`CHAdeMO`*
**e.g.** *`J1772,CCS`*

optional_parameters.name: available
optional_parameters.description: Only return EV charging stations with an available connector.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of results to return.

**Allowed values:** *1-500*.
**Default:** *20*.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description:
Return EV charging stations matching a specific query or keyword.

**e.g.** *`evgo`*
**e.g.** *`tesla`*
**e.g.** *`chargepoint`*

optional_parameters.name: min_kw
optional_parameters.description: Restrict the result to the availability for connectors with a specific minimal value of power in kilowatts (closed interval - with that value).

optional_parameters.name: max_kw
optional_parameters.description: Restrict the result to the availability for connectors with a specific maximum value of power in kilowatts (closed interval - with that value).

api_list.name: Search by Coordinates Point
api_list.description: Search for EV charging stations near specific geographic coordinates point.

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the geographic coordinates point to search near by.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the geographic coordinates point to search near by.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description:
Return EV charging stations matching a specific query or keyword.

**e.g.** *`evgo`*
**e.g.** *`tesla`*
**e.g.** *`chargepoint`*

optional_parameters.name: min_kw
optional_parameters.description: Restrict the result to the availability for connectors with a specific minimal value of power in kilowatts (closed interval - with that value).

optional_parameters.name: max_kw
optional_parameters.description: Restrict the result to the availability for connectors with a specific maximal value of power in kilowatts (closed interval - with that value).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of results to return.

**Allowed values:** *1-500*.
**Default:** *20*.

optional_parameters.name: available
optional_parameters.description: Find EV charging stations with an available connector.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Return EV charging stations with connectors of one or more types, specified as a comma (,) delimited list of connector types to match.

**e.g.** *`CHAdeMO`*
**e.g.** *`J1772,CCS`*
